long_description: Need entertainment on a road trip, long flight or in camp? Pull out the Magnetic Ludo Game from Outside Inside. It's classic fun for 2 or more players ages 8 and up. Plastic folding board and pieces come in a polyester-and-mesh carry bag with carabiner. Magnetic pieces stay put even when played on uneven or jostled surfaces. Folded board measures 6.5 x 3.25 x 1 in. Instructions included in the Outside Inside Magnetic Ludo Game.
